name: SpitOut
description:
3 aliens solving puzzles together on a space journey to become one. Controls: How to play:
  • Use the 3 characters and their abilities to solve the puzzle and move on to the next stage.
Tips:
  • In some stages, there are no orders to solve the puzzle
Credits: Nasser Omran - Game Developer
Tariq Amin - Game Designer- SFX - VFX
Sawsan Al-Aradi ~ sa3san.co - 3D Artist - UI
